item.title: Remember when the internet was fun?
item.description: The internet used to be fun I’ve been meaning to write some kind of Important Thinkpiece™ on the glory days of the early internet, but every time I sat down to do it, I would find others that were already out there. All of these articles answer the question “Why have a personal website?” with “Because it’s fun, and the internet used to be fun” to some degree. Some are the author’s story of why and how they have their own website; others are more pleading, manifesto-flavored calls to action.
